sections.raw:
0000-MAINLINE SECTION.
PERFORM 1000-INIT
THRU 1000-INIT-EXIT
PERFORM 2000-PRE-PROCESSING
THRU 2000-PRE-PROCESSING-EXIT
PERFORM 3000-MAIN-PROCESS
THRU 3000-MAIN-PROCESS-EXIT
PERFORM 4000-POST-PROCESSING
THRU 4000-POST-PROCESSING-EXIT
PERFORM 5000-CLEAN-UP
THRU 5000-CLEAN-UP-EXIT
.

1000-INIT.
IF EIBCALEN = 0
MOVE LOW-VALUES TO CICA00O
SET WS-MAP-ERASE TO TRUE
PERFORM 3030-SEND-MAP
THRU 3030-SEND-MAP-EXIT
ELSE
IF SDCA-CICS-SECONDENTER
MOVE LOW-VALUES TO CICA00I
EXEC CICS RECEIVE MAP('CICA00')
MAPSET('CICA00')
INTO(CICA00I)
RESP(WS-RESP-CODE)
END-EXEC
END-IF
END-IF
.

1010-ASK-TIME-DATE.
EXEC CICS
ASKTIME
ABSTIME(WS-GETTIME)
END-EXEC
EXEC CICS
FORMATTIME
ABSTIME(WS-GETTIME)
DATESEP('/')
YYYYMMDD(WS-DATEOUT)
END-EXEC
EXEC CICS
FORMATTIME
ABSTIME(WS-GETTIME)
TIMESEP
TIME(WS-TIMEOUT)
END-EXEC
MOVE WS-DATEOUT TO SYSDO
MOVE WS-TIMEOUT TO SYSTO
.

3000-MAIN-PROCESS.*>IMPORTANT
EVALUATE EIBAID
WHEN DFHPF1
EXEC CICS
XCTL PROGRAM('CIOCCIMN')
RESP(WS-RESP-CODE)
END-EXEC
IF WS-RESP-CODE NOT = DFHRESP(NORMAL)
MOVE 'PROGRAM CIOCCIMN IS NOT AVAILABLE'
TO MSGO
SET WS-MAP-DATAONLY TO TRUE
PERFORM 3030-SEND-MAP THRU 3030-SEND-MAP-EXIT
END-IF
WHEN DFHPF3
MOVE 'THANK YOU FOR USING THE SYSTEM' TO WS-MESSAGE
EXEC CICS
SEND CONTROL
CURSOR
ERASE
FREEKB
ALARM
END-EXEC
EXEC CICS
SEND FROM(WS-MESSAGE)
END-EXEC
PERFORM 5010-RETURN THRU 5010-RETURN-EXIT
WHEN DFHCLEAR
EXEC CICS
SEND CONTROL
CURSOR
ERASE
FREEKB
ALARM
END-EXEC
PERFORM 5010-RETURN THRU 5010-RETURN-EXIT
WHEN DFHPF9
MOVE LOW-VALUES TO CICA00O
SET WS-MAP-ERASE TO TRUE
PERFORM 3030-SEND-MAP
THRU 3030-SEND-MAP-EXIT
WHEN DFHENTER
IF WS-RESP-CODE NOT EQUAL DFHRESP(NORMAL)
MOVE 'INVALID REQUEST, CHECK YOUR INPUT.'
TO MSGO
SET WS-MAP-DATAONLY TO TRUE
PERFORM 3030-SEND-MAP
THRU 3030-SEND-MAP-EXIT
ELSE
PERFORM 3010-CHECK-INPUT
THRU 3010-CHECK-INPUT-EXIT
PERFORM 3020-XCTL
THRU 3020-XCTL-EXIT
END-IF
WHEN OTHER
MOVE 'INVALID KEY PRESSED!' TO MSGO
SET WS-MAP-DATAONLY TO TRUE
PERFORM 3030-SEND-MAP
THRU 3030-SEND-MAP-EXIT
END-EVALUATE
.

3010-CHECK-INPUT.
INITIALIZE CIMENU-REC
EVALUATE TRUE
WHEN (COMMUL NOT = 0)
MOVE COMMUI TO CIMENU-TRANSID
WHEN (MENUL  NOT = 0)
MOVE MENUI  TO CIMENU-TRANSID
WHEN (OPT1L  NOT = 0 AND OPT1I = 'S')
MOVE 'CI01' TO CIMENU-TRANSID
WHEN (OPT2L  NOT = 0 AND OPT2I = 'S')
MOVE 'CI02' TO CIMENU-TRANSID
WHEN (OPT3L  NOT = 0 AND OPT3I = 'S')
MOVE 'CI03' TO CIMENU-TRANSID
WHEN (OPT4L  NOT = 0 AND OPT4I = 'S')
MOVE 'CI04' TO CIMENU-TRANSID
WHEN (OPT5L  NOT = 0 AND OPT5I = 'S')
MOVE 'CI05' TO CIMENU-TRANSID
WHEN OTHER
MOVE 'INVALID INPUT' TO MSGO
SET WS-MAP-DATAONLY TO TRUE
PERFORM 3030-SEND-MAP THRU 3030-SEND-MAP-EXIT
END-EVALUATE
.

3020-XCTL.
EXEC CICS READ
FILE('CIMENU')
INTO(CIMENU-REC)
RIDFLD(CIMENU-TRANSID)
RESP(WS-RESP-CODE)
END-EXEC
EVALUATE WS-RESP-CODE
WHEN DFHRESP(NORMAL)
EXEC CICS
XCTL PROGRAM(CIMENU-PGM)
COMMAREA(CIMENU-TRANSID)
RESP(WS-RESP-CODE)
END-EXEC
IF WS-RESP-CODE NOT = DFHRESP(NORMAL)
STRING 'PROGRAM ' DELIMITED BY SIZE
CIMENU-PGM DELIMITED BY SPACE
' IS NOT AVAILABLE' DELIMITED BY SIZE
INTO MSGO
SET WS-MAP-DATAONLY TO TRUE
PERFORM 3030-SEND-MAP THRU 3030-SEND-MAP-EXIT
END-IF
WHEN DFHRESP(NOTFND)
MOVE 'INVALID TRANSATION ID!' TO MSGO
SET WS-MAP-DATAONLY TO TRUE
PERFORM 3030-SEND-MAP THRU 3030-SEND-MAP-EXIT
WHEN OTHER
MOVE 'CIMENU FILE ERROR!' TO MSGO
SET WS-MAP-DATAONLY TO TRUE
PERFORM 3030-SEND-MAP THRU 3030-SEND-MAP-EXIT
END-EVALUATE
.

3030-SEND-MAP.
PERFORM 1010-ASK-TIME-DATE
THRU 1010-ASK-TIME-DATE-EXIT
EVALUATE TRUE
WHEN WS-MAP-ERASE
EXEC CICS SEND
MAP('CICA00')
MAPSET('CICA00')
FROM(CICA00O)
ERASE
END-EXEC
WHEN WS-MAP-DATAONLY
EXEC CICS SEND
MAP('CICA00')
MAPSET('CICA00')
FROM(CICA00O)
DATAONLY
END-EXEC
END-EVALUATE
MOVE '1' TO WS-ENTER-FLAG
PERFORM 5020-RETURN-TRANS THRU 5020-RETURN-TRANS-EXIT
.

5020-RETURN-TRANS.
EXEC CICS RETURN TRANSID('CICA')
COMMAREA(WS-ENTER-FLAG)
END-EXEC
.

0000-MAINLINE.
PERFORM 1000-INIT
THRU 1000-INIT-EXIT
PERFORM 2000-PRE-PROCESSING
THRU 2000-PRE-PROCESSING-EXIT
PERFORM 3000-MAIN-PROCESS
THRU 3000-MAIN-PROCESS-EXIT
PERFORM 4000-POST-PROCESSING
THRU 4000-POST-PROCESSING-EXIT
PERFORM 5000-CLEAN-UP
THRU 5000-CLEAN-UP-EXIT
.

1000-INIT.
IF LK-FIRST-SEND = 'Y'
MOVE LOW-VALUES TO CICA01O
SET WS-MAP-ERASE TO TRUE
PERFORM 3030-SEND-MAP
THRU 3030-SEND-MAP-EXIT
ELSE
MOVE LOW-VALUES TO CICA01I
EXEC CICS RECEIVE MAP('CICA01')
MAPSET('CICA01')
INTO(CICA01I)
RESP(WS-RESP-CODE)
END-EXEC
END-IF
.

ASKTIME
ABSTIME(WS-GETTIME)
END-EXEC
EXEC CICS
FORMATTIME
ABSTIME(WS-GETTIME)
DATESEP('/')
YYYYMMDD(WS-DATEOUT)
END-EXEC
EXEC CICS
FORMATTIME
ABSTIME(WS-GETTIME)
TIMESEP
TIME(WS-TIMEOUT)
END-EXEC
MOVE WS-DATEOUT TO SYSDO
MOVE WS-TIMEOUT TO SYSTO
.

WHEN DFHPF1

3010-CHECK-INPUT.
IF COMMUL NOT = 0

FILE('CIMENU')

END-EXEC
EVALUATE WS-RESP-CODE

XCTL PROGRAM(CIMENU-PGM)

END-EXEC
IF WS-RESP-CODE NOT = DFHRESP(NORMAL)

' IS NOT AVAILABLE' DELIMITED BY SIZE
INTO MSGO
SET WS-MAP-DATAONLY TO TRUE
PERFORM 3030-SEND-MAP THRU 3030-SEND-MAP-EXIT
END-IF
WHEN DFHRESP(NOTFND)
MOVE 'INVALID TRANSATION ID!' TO MSGO
SET WS-MAP-DATAONLY TO TRUE
PERFORM 3030-SEND-MAP THRU 3030-SEND-MAP-EXIT
WHEN OTHER
MOVE 'CIMENU FILE ERROR!' TO MSGO
SET WS-MAP-DATAONLY TO TRUE
PERFORM 3030-SEND-MAP THRU 3030-SEND-MAP-EXIT
END-EVALUATE
END-IF
IF (CNAMEL = 0 OR IDTYPEL = 0 OR IDNUML = 0)
MOVE 'FIELDS CAN NOT BE EMPTY' TO MSGO
SET WS-MAP-DATAONLY TO TRUE
PERFORM 3030-SEND-MAP THRU 3030-SEND-MAP-EXIT
END-IF
IF (IDTYPEI NOT = 001 AND IDTYPEI NOT = 002)
MOVE 'INVAILD ID TYPE' TO MSGO
SET WS-MAP-DATAONLY TO TRUE
PERFORM 3030-SEND-MAP THRU 3030-SEND-MAP-EXIT
END-IF
IF (IDNUMI IS NOT NUMERIC)
MOVE 'IDMUN MUEST BE NUMBER' TO MSGO
SET WS-MAP-DATAONLY TO TRUE
PERFORM 3030-SEND-MAP THRU 3030-SEND-MAP-EXIT
END-IF
.

3020-XCTL.
INITIALIZE WS-COMMAREA
MOVE 'Y' TO WS-FIRST-SEND OF WS-COMMAREA
MOVE CNAMEI TO WS-CUSTOMER-NAME
MOVE IDTYPEI TO WS-ID-TYPE
MOVE IDNUMI TO WS-ID-NUMBER
.
EXEC CICS
XCTL PROGRAM('CIOCCA02')
COMMAREA(WS-COMMAREA)
RESP(WS-RESP-CODE)
END-EXEC
.

3030-SEND-MAP.
PERFORM 1010-ASK-TIME-DATE
THRU 1010-ASK-TIME-DATE-EXIT
EVALUATE TRUE
WHEN WS-MAP-ERASE
EXEC CICS SEND
MAP('CICA01')
MAPSET('CICA01')
FROM(CICA01O)
ERASE
END-EXEC
WHEN WS-MAP-DATAONLY
EXEC CICS SEND
MAP('CICA01')
MAPSET('CICA01')
FROM(CICA01O)
DATAONLY
END-EXEC
END-EVALUATE
PERFORM 5020-RETURN-TRANS THRU 5020-RETURN-TRANS-EXIT
.

5020-RETURN-TRANS.
INITIALIZE WS-COMMAREA-SELF
MOVE 'N' TO WS-FIRST-SEND OF WS-COMMAREA-SELF
MOVE LK-OPTION TO WS-OPTION OF WS-COMMAREA-SELF
EXEC CICS RETURN TRANSID('CIA1')
COMMAREA(WS-COMMAREA-SELF)
END-EXEC
.

0000-MAINLINE.
PERFORM 1000-INIT
THRU 1000-INIT-EXIT
PERFORM 2000-PRE-PROCESSING

PERFORM 3000-MAIN-PROCESS

THRU 3030-SEND-MAP-EXIT

.

1020-GET-EXISTING-CUST.*>IMPORTANT
INITIALIZE SDCA-SERVICE-COMMAREA
MOVE 'VBS.CI.CUSTOMER.INQ' TO SD-SRV-NAME
INITIALIZE CIC0003I-REC
MOVE LK-ID-NUMBER TO CIC0003I-ID
MOVE CIC0003I-REC TO SD-SRV-INPUT-DATA
EXEC CICS
LINK
PROGRAM(WS-PGM-SRV-DRIVER)
COMMAREA(WS-SRV-COMMAREA)
RESP(WS-RESP-CODE)
END-EXEC
EVALUATE WS-RESP-CODE
WHEN DFHRESP(NORMAL)
IF SD-RESP-CODE EQUAL ZEROS
PERFORM 1030-POPULATE-CUST
THRU 1030-POPULATE-CUST-EXIT
END-IF
END-EVALUATE
.

MOVE SD-SRV-OUTPUT-DATA       TO CIC0003O-REC
MOVE CIC0003O-ENGLISH-NAME    TO ENAMEO
MOVE CIC0003O-NATIONALITY     TO NATIONO

MOVE CIC0003O-LIVE-ZIP-CODE   TO LZIPCO

MOVE CIC0003O-COMPANY-COUNTRY TO CCTRYO
MOVE CIC0003O-COMPANY-PROVINCE TO CPROVO
MOVE CIC0003O-COMPANY-CITY    TO CCITYO

MOVE CIC0003O-COMPANY-ZIP-CODE TO CZIPCO
MOVE CIC0003O-COMPANY-ADRESS  TO CADDRO
MOVE CIC0003O-COMPANY-SERVE-YEAR TO CSRVYO
MOVE ATTR-UNPROT-MDT          TO ENAMEA
MOVE ATTR-UNPROT-MDT          TO NATIONA
MOVE ATTR-UNPROT-MDT          TO BIRTHA
MOVE ATTR-UNPROT-MDT          TO GENDERA
MOVE ATTR-UNPROT-MDT          TO MASTUSA
MOVE ATTR-UNPROT-MDT          TO ANSRYA
MOVE ATTR-UNPROT-MDT          TO MOBILEA
MOVE ATTR-UNPROT-MDT          TO EMAILA

MOVE ATTR-UNPROT-MDT          TO BIDATEA
MOVE ATTR-UNPROT-MDT          TO APDATEA

MOVE ATTR-UNPROT-MDT          TO LCITYA
MOVE ATTR-UNPROT-MDT          TO LDISTA
MOVE ATTR-UNPROT-MDT          TO LZIPCA
MOVE ATTR-UNPROT-MDT          TO LADDRA
MOVE ATTR-UNPROT-MDT          TO LYEARSA
MOVE ATTR-UNPROT-MDT          TO CNAMEA
MOVE ATTR-UNPROT-MDT          TO CCTRYA

MOVE ATTR-UNPROT-MDT          TO CCITYA

.

3000-MAIN-PROCESS.*>IMPORTANT
EVALUATE EIBAID
WHEN DFHPF1
MOVE 'Y000' TO WS-COMMAREA-CA01
EXEC CICS
XCTL PROGRAM('CIOCCA01')
COMMAREA(WS-COMMAREA-CA01)
RESP(WS-RESP-CODE)
END-EXEC
IF WS-RESP-CODE NOT = DFHRESP(NORMAL)
MOVE 'PROGRAM CIOCCA01 IS NOT AVAILABLE'
TO MSGO
SET WS-MAP-DATAONLY TO TRUE
PERFORM 3030-SEND-MAP THRU 3030-SEND-MAP-EXIT
END-IF
WHEN DFHPF3
MOVE 'THANK YOU FOR USING THE SYSTEM' TO WS-MESSAGE
EXEC CICS
SEND CONTROL
CURSOR
ERASE
FREEKB
ALARM
END-EXEC
EXEC CICS
SEND FROM(WS-MESSAGE)
END-EXEC
PERFORM 5010-RETURN THRU 5010-RETURN-EXIT
WHEN DFHCLEAR
EXEC CICS
SEND CONTROL
CURSOR
ERASE
FREEKB
ALARM
END-EXEC
PERFORM 5010-RETURN THRU 5010-RETURN-EXIT
WHEN DFHPF9
MOVE LOW-VALUES TO CICA02O
SET WS-MAP-ERASE TO TRUE
PERFORM 3030-SEND-MAP
THRU 3030-SEND-MAP-EXIT
WHEN DFHENTER
IF WS-RESP-CODE NOT EQUAL DFHRESP(NORMAL)
MOVE 'INVALID REQUEST, CHECK YOUR INPUT.'
TO MSGO
SET WS-MAP-DATAONLY TO TRUE
PERFORM 3030-SEND-MAP
THRU 3030-SEND-MAP-EXIT
ELSE
PERFORM 3010-CHECK-INPUT
THRU 3010-CHECK-INPUT-EXIT
PERFORM 3020-ADD-CUSTAPPL
THRU 3020-ADD-CUSTAPPL-EXIT
END-IF
WHEN OTHER
MOVE 'INVALID KEY PRESSED!' TO MSGO
SET WS-MAP-DATAONLY TO TRUE
PERFORM 3030-SEND-MAP
THRU 3030-SEND-MAP-EXIT
END-EVALUATE
.

3010-CHECK-INPUT.*>IMPORTANT
IF COMMUL NOT = 0
INITIALIZE CIMENU-REC
MOVE COMMUI TO CIMENU-TRANSID
EXEC CICS READ
FILE('CIMENU')
INTO(CIMENU-REC)
RIDFLD(CIMENU-TRANSID)
RESP(WS-RESP-CODE)
END-EXEC
EVALUATE WS-RESP-CODE
WHEN DFHRESP(NORMAL)
EXEC CICS
XCTL PROGRAM(CIMENU-PGM)
COMMAREA(CIMENU-TRANSID)
RESP(WS-RESP-CODE)
END-EXEC
IF WS-RESP-CODE NOT = DFHRESP(NORMAL)
STRING 'PROGRAM ' DELIMITED BY SIZE
CIMENU-PGM DELIMITED BY SPACE
' IS NOT AVAILABLE' DELIMITED BY SIZE
INTO MSGO
SET WS-MAP-DATAONLY TO TRUE
PERFORM 3030-SEND-MAP THRU 3030-SEND-MAP-EXIT
END-IF
WHEN DFHRESP(NOTFND)
MOVE 'INVALID TRANSATION ID!' TO MSGO
SET WS-MAP-DATAONLY TO TRUE
PERFORM 3030-SEND-MAP THRU 3030-SEND-MAP-EXIT
WHEN OTHER
MOVE 'CIMENU FILE ERROR!' TO MSGO
SET WS-MAP-DATAONLY TO TRUE
PERFORM 3030-SEND-MAP THRU 3030-SEND-MAP-EXIT
END-EVALUATE
END-IF
IF (EMAILL = 0 OR MOBILEL = 0 OR GENDERL = 0
OR NATIONL = 0 OR BIRTHL = 0 OR MASTUSL = 0
OR ANSRYL = 0 OR APDATEL = 0 OR BITYPEL = 0
OR BIDATEL = 0 OR BIADDRL = 0 OR BIRTHL = 0
OR LCTRYL = 0 OR LPROVL = 0 OR LCITYL = 0
OR LDISTL = 0 OR LZIPCL = 0 OR LYEARSL = 0
OR LADDRL = 0 OR CNAMEL = 0 OR CZIPCL = 0
OR CCTRYL = 0 OR CPROVL = 0 OR CCITYL = 0
OR CDISTL = 0 OR CADDRL = 0 OR CSRVYL = 0)
MOVE 'FIELDS CAN NOT BE EMPTY' TO MSGO
SET WS-MAP-DATAONLY TO TRUE
PERFORM 3030-SEND-MAP THRU 3030-SEND-MAP-EXIT
END-IF
IF (GENDERI NOT = 'M' AND GENDERI NOT = 'F')
MOVE 'INVAILD GENDER' TO MSGO
SET WS-MAP-DATAONLY TO TRUE
PERFORM 3030-SEND-MAP THRU 3030-SEND-MAP-EXIT
END-IF
IF (MASTUSI NOT = 'M' AND MASTUSI NOT = 'U')
MOVE 'INVAILD MARITAL STATUS' TO MSGO
SET WS-MAP-DATAONLY TO TRUE
PERFORM 3030-SEND-MAP THRU 3030-SEND-MAP-EXIT
END-IF
IF (BITYPEI NOT = 001 AND BITYPEI NOT = 002)
MOVE 'INVAILD BILL TYPE' TO MSGO
SET WS-MAP-DATAONLY TO TRUE
PERFORM 3030-SEND-MAP THRU 3030-SEND-MAP-EXIT
END-IF
IF (BIDATEI NOT = 05 AND BIDATEI NOT = 15 AND BIDATEI
NOT = 25)
MOVE 'INVAILD BILL DATE' TO MSGO
SET WS-MAP-DATAONLY TO TRUE
PERFORM 3030-SEND-MAP THRU 3030-SEND-MAP-EXIT
END-IF
IF (BIADDRI NOT = 001 AND BIADDRI NOT = 002 AND BIADDRI
NOT = 003)
MOVE 'INVAILD BILL ADDRESS' TO MSGO
SET WS-MAP-DATAONLY TO TRUE
PERFORM 3030-SEND-MAP THRU 3030-SEND-MAP-EXIT
END-IF
.

3020-ADD-CUSTAPPL.*>IMPORTANT
INITIALIZE SDCA-SERVICE-COMMAREA
MOVE 'VBS.CI.CUSTAPPL.ADD' TO SD-SRV-NAME
INITIALIZE CIC0011I-REC
PERFORM 3040-POPULATE-CICUS
THRU 3040-POPULATE-CICUS-EXIT
MOVE CIC0011I-REC  TO SD-SRV-INPUT-DATA
EXEC CICS
LINK
PROGRAM(WS-PGM-SRV-DRIVER)
COMMAREA(WS-SRV-COMMAREA)
RESP(WS-RESP-CODE)
END-EXEC
EVALUATE WS-RESP-CODE
WHEN DFHRESP(NORMAL)
IF SD-RESP-CODE EQUAL ZEROS
MOVE 'APPLICATION CREATED SUCCESSFULLY' TO MSGO
MOVE 'T' TO WS-FIRST-SEND
MOVE 'F1=RETURN' TO KEYO
ELSE
MOVE SD-RESP-ADDITIONAL TO MSGO
END-IF
WHEN OTHER
MOVE 'SERVICE PROGRAM ERROR' TO MSGO
END-EVALUATE
SET WS-MAP-DATAONLY TO TRUE
PERFORM 3030-SEND-MAP
THRU 3030-SEND-MAP-EXIT
.

3030-SEND-MAP.
MOVE LK-ID-NUMBER             TO IDNUMO
MOVE LK-ID-TYPE               TO IDTYPEO
MOVE LK-CUSTOMER-NAME         TO NAMEO
MOVE ATTR-PROT-SKIP-MDT       TO NAMEA
MOVE ATTR-PROT-SKIP-MDT       TO IDTYPEA
MOVE ATTR-PROT-SKIP-MDT       TO IDNUMA
PERFORM 1010-ASK-TIME-DATE
THRU 1010-ASK-TIME-DATE-EXIT
EVALUATE TRUE
WHEN WS-MAP-ERASE
EXEC CICS SEND
MAP('CICA02')
MAPSET('CICA02')
FROM(CICA02O)
ERASE
END-EXEC
WHEN WS-MAP-DATAONLY
EXEC CICS SEND
MAP('CICA02')
MAPSET('CICA02')
FROM(CICA02O)
DATAONLY
END-EXEC
END-EVALUATE
PERFORM 5020-RETURN-TRANS THRU 5020-RETURN-TRANS-EXIT
.

3040-POPULATE-CICUS.
MOVE NAMEI     TO        CIC0011I-NAME
MOVE ENAMEI    TO        CIC0011I-ENGLISH-NAME
MOVE NATIONI   TO        CIC0011I-NATIONALITY
MOVE BIRTHI    TO        CIC0011I-BIRTH-DATE
MOVE GENDERI   TO        CIC0011I-GENDER
MOVE MASTUSI   TO        CIC0011I-MARITAL-STATUS
MOVE IDTYPEI   TO        CIC0011I-ID-TYPE
MOVE IDNUMI    TO        CIC0011I-ID-NUMBER
MOVE ANSRYI    TO        CIC0011I-ANNUAL-SALARY
MOVE MOBILEI   TO        CIC0011I-MOBILE

1020-GET-APPL-LIST.*>IMPORTANT
INITIALIZE SDCA-SERVICE-COMMAREA
MOVE 'VBS.CI.APPLICAN.IN2' TO SD-SRV-NAME
MOVE CIC0009I-REC TO SD-SRV-INPUT-DATA
EXEC CICS
LINK
PROGRAM(WS-PGM-SRV-DRIVER)
COMMAREA(WS-SRV-COMMAREA)
RESP(WS-RESP-CODE)
END-EXEC
EVALUATE WS-RESP-CODE
WHEN DFHRESP(NORMAL)
INITIALIZE CIC0009O-REC
MOVE SD-SRV-OUTPUT-DATA TO CIC0009O-REC
END-EVALUATE
.

1030-POPULATE-MAP.
PERFORM VARYING IX FROM 1 BY 1 UNTIL IX > 14
IF IX <= CIC0009O-COUNT
INITIALIZE CIC0012I-REC
MOVE CIC0009O-APPL-ID(IX) TO CIC0012I-APPL-ID
PERFORM 1040-GET-CUSTAPPL
THRU 1040-GET-CUSTAPPL-EXIT
MOVE CIC0012O-ID             TO APPIDO(IX)
MOVE ATTR-PROT-SKIP-MDT      TO APPIDA(IX)
MOVE CIC0012O-NAME           TO NAMEO(IX)
MOVE CIC0012O-CUST-ID-NUMBER TO IDNUMO(IX)
STRING CIC0012O-LAST-DATE ' ' CIC0012O-LAST-TIME
DELIMITED BY SIZE   INTO LASTO(IX)
EVALUATE CIC0012O-STATUS
WHEN 001
MOVE 'NEW'          TO STATO(IX)
WHEN 002
MOVE 'CHECKED'      TO STATO(IX)
WHEN 003
MOVE 'REVIEWED'     TO STATO(IX)
WHEN 004
MOVE 'INVESTIED'    TO STATO(IX)
WHEN 005
MOVE 'CREDITED'     TO STATO(IX)
WHEN 010
MOVE 'REVRETN'      TO STATO(IX)
WHEN 011
MOVE 'INVRETN'      TO STATO(IX)
WHEN 012
MOVE 'CHKFAIL'      TO STATO(IX)
WHEN 013
MOVE 'REVFAIL'      TO STATO(IX)
WHEN 014
MOVE 'INVFAIL'      TO STATO(IX)
WHEN 015
MOVE 'CREFAIL'      TO STATO(IX)
WHEN OTHER
MOVE 'UNKNOWN'      TO STATO(IX)
END-EVALUATE
ELSE
MOVE ATTR-PROT-DARK TO OPTA(IX)
END-IF
END-PERFORM
.

COMMAREA(WS-SRV-COMMAREA)
RESP(WS-RESP-CODE)
END-EXEC

WHEN DFHRESP(NORMAL)
IF SD-RESP-CODE EQUAL ZEROS
INITIALIZE CIC0012O-REC
MOVE SD-SRV-OUTPUT-DATA TO CIC0012O-REC
END-IF
END-EVALUATE
.

3000-MAIN-PROCESS.*>IMPORTANT
EVALUATE EIBAID
WHEN DFHPF1
EXEC CICS
XCTL PROGRAM('CIOCCA00')
RESP(WS-RESP-CODE)
END-EXEC
IF WS-RESP-CODE NOT = DFHRESP(NORMAL)
MOVE 'PROGRAM CIOCCA00 IS NOT AVAILABLE'
TO MSGO
SET WS-MAP-DATAONLY TO TRUE
PERFORM 3030-SEND-MAP THRU 3030-SEND-MAP-EXIT
END-IF
WHEN DFHPF3
MOVE 'THANK YOU FOR USING THE SYSTEM' TO WS-MESSAGE
EXEC CICS
SEND CONTROL
CURSOR
ERASE
FREEKB
ALARM
END-EXEC
EXEC CICS
SEND FROM(WS-MESSAGE)
END-EXEC
PERFORM 5010-RETURN THRU 5010-RETURN-EXIT
WHEN DFHCLEAR
EXEC CICS
SEND CONTROL
CURSOR
ERASE
FREEKB
ALARM
END-EXEC
PERFORM 5010-RETURN THRU 5010-RETURN-EXIT
WHEN DFHPF7
INITIALIZE CIC0009I-REC
MOVE LK-OPTION TO CIC0009I-OPTION
MOVE LK-APPL-MIN-ID TO CIC0009I-APPL-ID
MOVE 'F7' TO CIC0009I-DIRECTION
PERFORM 1020-GET-APPL-LIST
THRU 1020-GET-APPL-LIST-EXIT
IF CIC0009O-COUNT = ZEROS
MOVE 'IT IS ALREADY THE TOP!' TO MSGO
SET WS-MAP-DATAONLY TO TRUE
ELSE
MOVE LOW-VALUES TO CICA03O
PERFORM 1030-POPULATE-MAP
THRU 1030-POPULATE-MAP-EXIT
SET WS-MAP-ERASE TO TRUE
END-IF
PERFORM 3030-SEND-MAP
THRU 3030-SEND-MAP-EXIT
WHEN DFHPF8
INITIALIZE CIC0009I-REC
MOVE LK-OPTION TO CIC0009I-OPTION
MOVE LK-APPL-MAX-ID TO CIC0009I-APPL-ID
MOVE 'F8' TO CIC0009I-DIRECTION
PERFORM 1020-GET-APPL-LIST
THRU 1020-GET-APPL-LIST-EXIT
IF CIC0009O-COUNT = ZEROS
MOVE 'IT IS ALREADY THE BOTTOM!' TO MSGO
SET WS-MAP-DATAONLY TO TRUE
ELSE
MOVE LOW-VALUES TO CICA03O
PERFORM 1030-POPULATE-MAP
THRU 1030-POPULATE-MAP-EXIT
SET WS-MAP-ERASE TO TRUE
END-IF
PERFORM 3030-SEND-MAP
THRU 3030-SEND-MAP-EXIT
WHEN DFHPF9
INITIALIZE CIC0009I-REC
MOVE LK-OPTION TO CIC0009I-OPTION
SUBTRACT 1 FROM LK-APPL-MIN-ID
GIVING CIC0009I-APPL-ID
MOVE 'F8' TO CIC0009I-DIRECTION
PERFORM 1020-GET-APPL-LIST
THRU 1020-GET-APPL-LIST-EXIT
IF CIC0009O-COUNT = 0
MOVE 'NO RECORDS LISTED!' TO MSGO
END-IF
MOVE LOW-VALUES TO CICA03O
PERFORM 1030-POPULATE-MAP
THRU 1030-POPULATE-MAP-EXIT
SET WS-MAP-ERASE TO TRUE
PERFORM 3030-SEND-MAP
THRU 3030-SEND-MAP-EXIT
WHEN DFHENTER
IF WS-RESP-CODE NOT EQUAL DFHRESP(NORMAL)
MOVE 'INVALID REQUEST, CHECK YOUR INPUT.'
TO MSGO
SET WS-MAP-DATAONLY TO TRUE
PERFORM 3030-SEND-MAP
THRU 3030-SEND-MAP-EXIT
ELSE
PERFORM 3010-CHECK-INPUT
THRU 3010-CHECK-INPUT-EXIT
PERFORM 3020-XCTL
THRU 3020-XCTL-EXIT
END-IF
WHEN OTHER
MOVE 'INVALID KEY PRESSED!' TO MSGO
SET WS-MAP-DATAONLY TO TRUE
PERFORM 3030-SEND-MAP
THRU 3030-SEND-MAP-EXIT
END-EVALUATE
.

CIMENU-PGM DELIMITED BY SPACE
' IS NOT AVAILABLE' DELIMITED BY SIZE
INTO MSGO
SET WS-MAP-DATAONLY TO TRUE
PERFORM 3030-SEND-MAP THRU 3030-SEND-MAP-EXIT
END-IF
WHEN DFHRESP(NOTFND)
MOVE 'INVALID TRANSATION ID!' TO MSGO
SET WS-MAP-DATAONLY TO TRUE
PERFORM 3030-SEND-MAP THRU 3030-SEND-MAP-EXIT
WHEN OTHER
MOVE 'CIMENU FILE ERROR!' TO MSGO
SET WS-MAP-DATAONLY TO TRUE
PERFORM 3030-SEND-MAP THRU 3030-SEND-MAP-EXIT
END-EVALUATE
END-IF
IF (CHKIDL = 0 OR CHKDTL = 0 OR CHKRTL = 0
OR CHKRRL = 0 OR COMMTL = 0 )
MOVE 'FIELDS CAN NOT BE EMPTY' TO MSGO
SET WS-MAP-DATAONLY TO TRUE
PERFORM 3030-SEND-MAP THRU 3030-SEND-MAP-EXIT
END-IF
IF (CHKRTI NOT = 001 AND CHKRTI NOT = 002)
MOVE 'INVAILD RESULT' TO MSGO
SET WS-MAP-DATAONLY TO TRUE
PERFORM 3030-SEND-MAP THRU 3030-SEND-MAP-EXIT
END-IF
IF (CHKRRI NOT = 001 AND CHKRRI NOT = 002 AND
CHKRRI NOT = 003 AND CHKRRI NOT = 004 AND
CHKRRI NOT = 005 AND CHKRRI NOT = 006)
MOVE 'INVAILD REFUSE REASON' TO MSGO
SET WS-MAP-DATAONLY TO TRUE
PERFORM 3030-SEND-MAP THRU 3030-SEND-MAP-EXIT
END-IF
IF (CHKRTI = 001 AND CHKRRI NOT = 001)
MOVE 'INVAILD REFUSE REASON MUST = 001 ' TO MSGO
SET WS-MAP-DATAONLY TO TRUE
PERFORM 3030-SEND-MAP THRU 3030-SEND-MAP-EXIT
END-IF
IF (CHKRTI NOT = 001 AND CHKRRI = 001)
MOVE 'INVAILD REFUSE REASON CAN NOT = 001 ' TO MSGO
SET WS-MAP-DATAONLY TO TRUE
PERFORM 3030-SEND-MAP THRU 3030-SEND-MAP-EXIT
END-IF
.

ELSE

SET WS-MAP-DATAONLY TO TRUE

WHEN OTHER

ELSE

THRU 3030-SEND-MAP-EXIT

3010-CHECK-INPUT.*>IMPORTANT

INITIALIZE CIMENU-REC

FILE('CIMENU')
INTO(CIMENU-REC)
RIDFLD(CIMENU-TRANSID)
RESP(WS-RESP-CODE)
END-EXEC
EVALUATE WS-RESP-CODE
WHEN DFHRESP(NORMAL)
EXEC CICS
XCTL PROGRAM(CIMENU-PGM)
COMMAREA(CIMENU-TRANSID)
RESP(WS-RESP-CODE)
END-EXEC
IF WS-RESP-CODE NOT = DFHRESP(NORMAL)
STRING 'PROGRAM ' DELIMITED BY SIZE
CIMENU-PGM DELIMITED BY SPACE
' IS NOT AVAILABLE' DELIMITED BY SIZE
INTO MSGO
SET WS-MAP-DATAONLY TO TRUE
PERFORM 3030-SEND-MAP THRU 3030-SEND-MAP-EXIT
END-IF
WHEN DFHRESP(NOTFND)
MOVE 'INVALID TRANSATION ID!' TO MSGO
SET WS-MAP-DATAONLY TO TRUE
PERFORM 3030-SEND-MAP THRU 3030-SEND-MAP-EXIT
WHEN OTHER
MOVE 'CIMENU FILE ERROR!' TO MSGO
SET WS-MAP-DATAONLY TO TRUE
PERFORM 3030-SEND-MAP THRU 3030-SEND-MAP-EXIT
END-EVALUATE
END-IF
IF (INVIDL = 0 OR INVDTL = 0 OR HAACCL = 0
OR HDCCDL = 0 OR CDTHSYL = 0 OR INVRLTL = 0
OR RFERSNL = 0 OR COMMTL = 0)
MOVE 'FIELDS CAN NOT BE EMPTY' TO MSGO
SET WS-MAP-DATAONLY TO TRUE
PERFORM 3030-SEND-MAP THRU 3030-SEND-MAP-EXIT
END-IF
IF (HAACCI NOT = 001 AND HAACCI NOT = 002 AND HAACCI
NOT = 003)
MOVE 'INVAILD ACCOUNT' TO MSGO
SET WS-MAP-DATAONLY TO TRUE
PERFORM 3030-SEND-MAP THRU 3030-SEND-MAP-EXIT
END-IF
IF (HDCCDI NOT = 001 AND HDCCDI NOT = 002)
MOVE 'INVAILD CREDIT CARD' TO MSGO
SET WS-MAP-DATAONLY TO TRUE
PERFORM 3030-SEND-MAP THRU 3030-SEND-MAP-EXIT
END-IF
IF (CDTHSYI NOT = 001 AND CDTHSYI NOT = 002 AND CDTHSYI
NOT = 003 AND CDTHSYI NOT = 004 AND CDTHSYI NOT
= 005)
MOVE 'INVAILD CREDIT HISTORY' TO MSGO
SET WS-MAP-DATAONLY TO TRUE
PERFORM 3030-SEND-MAP THRU 3030-SEND-MAP-EXIT
END-IF
IF (INVRLTI NOT = 001 AND INVRLTI NOT = 002
AND INVRLTI NOT = 003)
MOVE 'INVAILD INVESTIGATE RESULT' TO MSGO
SET WS-MAP-DATAONLY TO TRUE
PERFORM 3030-SEND-MAP THRU 3030-SEND-MAP-EXIT
END-IF
IF (INVRLTI = 001 AND RFERSNI NOT = 001)
MOVE 'WRONG REFUSE REASON,REFUSE REASON MUST BE 001'
TO MSGO
SET WS-MAP-DATAONLY TO TRUE
PERFORM 3030-SEND-MAP THRU 3030-SEND-MAP-EXIT
END-IF
IF (INVRLTI NOT = 001 AND RFERSNI = 001)
MOVE 'WRONG REFUSE REASON,REFUSE REASON CAN NOT BE 0
'01' TO MSGO
SET WS-MAP-DATAONLY TO TRUE
PERFORM 3030-SEND-MAP THRU 3030-SEND-MAP-EXIT
END-IF
IF (RFERSNI NOT = 001 AND RFERSNI NOT = 002 AND RFERSNI
NOT = 003 AND RFERSNI NOT = 004 AND RFERSNI NOT
= 005 AND RFERSNI NOT = 006)
MOVE 'INVAILD REFUSE REASON' TO MSGO
SET WS-MAP-DATAONLY TO TRUE
PERFORM 3030-SEND-MAP THRU 3030-SEND-MAP-EXIT
END-IF

SEND CONTROL

ALARM

THRU 3030-SEND-MAP-EXIT

3010-CHECK-INPUT.*>IMPORTANT
IF COMMUL NOT = 0
INITIALIZE CIMENU-REC
MOVE COMMUI TO CIMENU-TRANSID
EXEC CICS READ
FILE('CIMENU')
INTO(CIMENU-REC)
RIDFLD(CIMENU-TRANSID)
RESP(WS-RESP-CODE)
END-EXEC
EVALUATE WS-RESP-CODE
WHEN DFHRESP(NORMAL)
EXEC CICS
XCTL PROGRAM(CIMENU-PGM)
COMMAREA(CIMENU-TRANSID)
RESP(WS-RESP-CODE)
END-EXEC
IF WS-RESP-CODE NOT = DFHRESP(NORMAL)
STRING 'PROGRAM ' DELIMITED BY SIZE
CIMENU-PGM DELIMITED BY SPACE
' IS NOT AVAILABLE' DELIMITED BY SIZE
INTO MSGO
SET WS-MAP-DATAONLY TO TRUE
PERFORM 3030-SEND-MAP THRU 3030-SEND-MAP-EXIT
END-IF
WHEN DFHRESP(NOTFND)
MOVE 'INVALID TRANSATION ID!' TO MSGO
SET WS-MAP-DATAONLY TO TRUE
PERFORM 3030-SEND-MAP THRU 3030-SEND-MAP-EXIT
WHEN OTHER
MOVE 'CIMENU FILE ERROR!' TO MSGO
SET WS-MAP-DATAONLY TO TRUE
PERFORM 3030-SEND-MAP THRU 3030-SEND-MAP-EXIT
END-EVALUATE
END-IF
IF (EMAILL = 0 OR MOBILEL = 0 OR GENDERL = 0
OR NATIONL = 0 OR BIRTHL = 0 OR MASTUSL = 0
OR ANSRYL = 0 OR APDATEL = 0 OR BITYPEL = 0
OR BIDATEL = 0 OR BIADDRL = 0 OR BIRTHL = 0
OR LCTRYL = 0 OR LPROVL = 0 OR LCITYL = 0
OR LDISTL = 0 OR LZIPCL = 0 OR LYEARSL = 0
OR LADDRL = 0 OR CNAMEL = 0 OR CZIPCL = 0
OR CCTRYL = 0 OR CPROVL = 0 OR CCITYL = 0
OR CDISTL = 0 OR CADDRL = 0 OR CSRVYL = 0)
MOVE 'FIELDS CAN NOT BE EMPTY' TO MSGO
SET WS-MAP-DATAONLY TO TRUE
PERFORM 3030-SEND-MAP THRU 3030-SEND-MAP-EXIT
END-IF
IF (GENDERI NOT = 'M' AND GENDERI NOT = 'F')
MOVE 'INVAILD GENDER' TO MSGO
SET WS-MAP-DATAONLY TO TRUE
PERFORM 3030-SEND-MAP THRU 3030-SEND-MAP-EXIT
END-IF
IF (MASTUSI NOT = 'M' AND MASTUSI NOT = 'U')
MOVE 'INVAILD MARITAL STATUS' TO MSGO
SET WS-MAP-DATAONLY TO TRUE
PERFORM 3030-SEND-MAP THRU 3030-SEND-MAP-EXIT
END-IF

SET WS-MAP-DATAONLY TO TRUE
PERFORM 3030-SEND-MAP THRU 3030-SEND-MAP-EXIT
END-IF
IF (BIDATEI NOT = 05 AND BIDATEI NOT = 15 AND BIDATEI
NOT = 25)
MOVE 'INVAILD BILL DATE' TO MSGO
SET WS-MAP-DATAONLY TO TRUE
PERFORM 3030-SEND-MAP THRU 3030-SEND-MAP-EXIT
END-IF
IF (BIADDRI NOT = 001 AND BIADDRI NOT = 002 AND BIADDRI
NOT = 003)

SET WS-MAP-DATAONLY TO TRUE
PERFORM 3030-SEND-MAP THRU 3030-SEND-MAP-EXIT
END-IF

SEND CONTROL

THRU 3030-SEND-MAP-EXIT

3010-CHECK-INPUT.*>IMPORTANT
IF COMMUL NOT = 0

FILE('CIMENU')
INTO(CIMENU-REC)
RIDFLD(CIMENU-TRANSID)
RESP(WS-RESP-CODE)
END-EXEC
EVALUATE WS-RESP-CODE
WHEN DFHRESP(NORMAL)
EXEC CICS
XCTL PROGRAM(CIMENU-PGM)
COMMAREA(WS-COMMAREA)
RESP(WS-RESP-CODE)
END-EXEC
IF WS-RESP-CODE NOT = DFHRESP(NORMAL)
STRING 'PROGRAM ' DELIMITED BY SIZE
CIMENU-PGM DELIMITED BY SPACE
' IS NOT AVAILABLE' DELIMITED BY SIZE
INTO MSGO
SET WS-MAP-DATAONLY TO TRUE
PERFORM 3030-SEND-MAP THRU 3030-SEND-MAP-EXIT
END-IF
WHEN DFHRESP(NOTFND)
MOVE 'INVALID TRANSATION ID!' TO MSGO
SET WS-MAP-DATAONLY TO TRUE
PERFORM 3030-SEND-MAP THRU 3030-SEND-MAP-EXIT
WHEN OTHER
MOVE 'CIMENU FILE ERROR!' TO MSGO
SET WS-MAP-DATAONLY TO TRUE
PERFORM 3030-SEND-MAP THRU 3030-SEND-MAP-EXIT
END-EVALUATE
END-IF
IF (EMAILL = 0 OR MOBILEL = 0 OR GENDERL = 0
OR NATIONL = 0 OR BIRTHL = 0 OR MASTUSL = 0
OR ANSRYL = 0 OR APDATEL = 0 OR BITYPEL = 0
OR BIDATEL = 0 OR BIADDRL = 0 OR BIRTHL = 0
OR LCTRYL = 0 OR LPROVL = 0 OR LCITYL = 0
OR LDISTL = 0 OR LZIPCL = 0 OR LYEARSL = 0
OR LADDRL = 0 OR CNAMEL = 0 OR CZIPCL = 0
OR CCTRYL = 0 OR CPROVL = 0 OR CCITYL = 0
OR CDISTL = 0 OR CADDRL = 0 OR CSRVYL = 0)
MOVE 'FIELDS CAN NOT BE EMPTY' TO MSGO
SET WS-MAP-DATAONLY TO TRUE
PERFORM 3030-SEND-MAP THRU 3030-SEND-MAP-EXIT
END-IF
IF (GENDERI NOT = 'M' AND GENDERI NOT = 'F')
MOVE 'INVAILD GENDER' TO MSGO
SET WS-MAP-DATAONLY TO TRUE
PERFORM 3030-SEND-MAP THRU 3030-SEND-MAP-EXIT
END-IF
IF (MASTUSI NOT = 'M' AND MASTUSI NOT = 'U')
MOVE 'INVAILD MARITAL STATUS' TO MSGO
SET WS-MAP-DATAONLY TO TRUE
PERFORM 3030-SEND-MAP THRU 3030-SEND-MAP-EXIT
END-IF
IF (BITYPEI NOT = 001 AND BITYPEI NOT = 002)
MOVE 'INVAILD BILL TYPE' TO MSGO
SET WS-MAP-DATAONLY TO TRUE
PERFORM 3030-SEND-MAP THRU 3030-SEND-MAP-EXIT
END-IF
IF (BIDATEI NOT = 05 AND BIDATEI NOT = 15 AND BIDATEI
NOT = 25)
MOVE 'INVAILD BILL DATE' TO MSGO
SET WS-MAP-DATAONLY TO TRUE
PERFORM 3030-SEND-MAP THRU 3030-SEND-MAP-EXIT
END-IF
IF (BIADDRI NOT = 001 AND BIADDRI NOT = 002 AND BIADDRI
NOT = 003)
MOVE 'INVAILD BILL ADDRESS' TO MSGO
SET WS-MAP-DATAONLY TO TRUE
PERFORM 3030-SEND-MAP THRU 3030-SEND-MAP-EXIT
END-IF

1030-POPULATE-MAP.
PERFORM VARYING IX FROM 1 BY 1 UNTIL IX > 14
IF IX <= CIC0016O-COUNT
INITIALIZE CIC0015I-REC
MOVE CIC0016O-CARD-NUMB(IX) TO CIC0015I-NUMB
PERFORM 1040-GET-CARD
THRU 1040-GET-CARD-EXIT
MOVE CIC0015O-NUMB           TO CADIDO(IX)

MOVE CIC0015O-PROD-TYPE      TO PRTIDO(IX)
MOVE CIC0015O-CURR-EXPIRY-DATE TO EXTIMEO(IX)
MOVE CIC0015O-LAST-DATE      TO LTIMEO(IX)
EVALUATE CIC0015O-STATUS
WHEN 001
MOVE 'NEW'          TO STATSO(IX)
WHEN 002
MOVE 'CHECKED'      TO STATSO(IX)
WHEN 003
MOVE 'REVIEWED'     TO STATSO(IX)
WHEN 004
MOVE 'INVESTIED'    TO STATSO(IX)
WHEN 005
MOVE 'CREDITED'     TO STATSO(IX)
WHEN 010
MOVE 'REVRETN'      TO STATSO(IX)
WHEN 011
MOVE 'INVRETN'      TO STATSO(IX)
WHEN 012
MOVE 'CHKFAIL'      TO STATSO(IX)
WHEN 013
MOVE 'REVFAIL'      TO STATSO(IX)
WHEN 014
MOVE 'INVFAIL'      TO STATSO(IX)
WHEN 015
MOVE 'CREFAIL'      TO STATSO(IX)
WHEN OTHER
MOVE 'UNKNOWN'      TO STATSO(IX)
END-EVALUATE
ELSE
MOVE ATTR-PROT-DARK TO OPTA(IX)
END-IF
END-PERFORM
.

1030-APPLICAN-CUST-SHOW.*>IMPORTANT
PERFORM VARYING IX FROM 1 BY 1 UNTIL IX > 14
IF IX <= CIC0008O-COUNT
INITIALIZE CIC0012I-REC
MOVE CIC0008O-APPL-ID(IX)    TO CIC0012I-APPL-ID
PERFORM 1040-GET-CUSTAPPL
THRU 1040-GET-CUSTAPPL-EXIT
MOVE CIC0012O-ID             TO APPIDO(IX)
MOVE ATTR-PROT-SKIP-MDT      TO APPIDA(IX)
MOVE CIC0012O-NAME           TO NAMEO(IX)
STRING CIC0012O-IN-DATE ' ' CIC0012O-IN-TIME
DELIMITED BY SIZE     INTO APPLO(IX)
STRING CIC0012O-LAST-DATE ' ' CIC0012O-LAST-TIME
DELIMITED BY SIZE     INTO LASTO(IX)
EVALUATE CIC0012O-STATUS
WHEN 001
MOVE 'NEW'          TO STATO(IX)
WHEN 002
MOVE 'CHECKED'      TO STATO(IX)
WHEN 003
MOVE 'REVIEWED'     TO STATO(IX)
WHEN 004
MOVE 'INVESTIED'    TO STATO(IX)
WHEN 005
MOVE 'CREDITED'     TO STATO(IX)
WHEN 010
MOVE 'REVRETN'      TO STATO(IX)
WHEN 011
MOVE 'INVRETN'      TO STATO(IX)
WHEN 012
MOVE 'CHKFAIL'      TO STATO(IX)
WHEN 013
MOVE 'REVFAIL'      TO STATO(IX)
WHEN 014
MOVE 'INVFAIL'      TO STATO(IX)
WHEN 015
MOVE 'CREFAIL'      TO STATO(IX)
WHEN OTHER
MOVE 'UNKNOWN'      TO STATO(IX)
END-EVALUATE
ELSE
MOVE ATTR-PROT-DARK TO OPTA(IX)
END-IF
END-PERFORM
.

3010-CHECK-INPUT.*>IMPORTANT
IF COMMUL NOT = 0
INITIALIZE CIMENU-REC
MOVE COMMUI TO CIMENU-TRANSID
EXEC CICS READ
FILE('CIMENU')
INTO(CIMENU-REC)
RIDFLD(CIMENU-TRANSID)
RESP(WS-RESP-CODE)
END-EXEC
EVALUATE WS-RESP-CODE
WHEN DFHRESP(NORMAL)
EXEC CICS
XCTL PROGRAM(CIMENU-PGM)
COMMAREA(WS-COMMAREA)
RESP(WS-RESP-CODE)
END-EXEC
IF WS-RESP-CODE NOT = DFHRESP(NORMAL)
STRING 'PROGRAM ' DELIMITED BY SIZE
CIMENU-PGM DELIMITED BY SPACE
' IS NOT AVAILABLE' DELIMITED BY SIZE
INTO MSGO
SET WS-MAP-DATAONLY TO TRUE
PERFORM 3030-SEND-MAP THRU 3030-SEND-MAP-EXIT
END-IF
WHEN DFHRESP(NOTFND)
MOVE 'INVALID TRANSATION ID!' TO MSGO
SET WS-MAP-DATAONLY TO TRUE
PERFORM 3030-SEND-MAP THRU 3030-SEND-MAP-EXIT
WHEN OTHER
MOVE 'CIMENU FILE ERROR!' TO MSGO
SET WS-MAP-DATAONLY TO TRUE
PERFORM 3030-SEND-MAP THRU 3030-SEND-MAP-EXIT
END-EVALUATE
END-IF
IF (PWD1L NOT = 6 OR PWD2L NOT = 6)
MOVE 'THE PASSWORD LENGTH MUST BE 6' TO MSGO
SET WS-MAP-DATAONLY TO TRUE
PERFORM 3030-SEND-MAP THRU 3030-SEND-MAP-EXIT
END-IF
IF (PWD1I IS NOT NUMERIC OR PWD2I IS NOT NUMERIC)
MOVE 'THE PASSWORD MUST BE NUMBER!' TO MSGO
SET WS-MAP-DATAONLY TO TRUE
PERFORM 3030-SEND-MAP THRU 3030-SEND-MAP-EXIT
END-IF
IF (PWD1I NOT = PWD2I)
MOVE 'THE TWO INPUT PASSWORD DOES NOT MATCH' TO MSGO
SET WS-MAP-DATAONLY TO TRUE
PERFORM 3030-SEND-MAP THRU 3030-SEND-MAP-EXIT
END-IF
.

3020-UPDATE-CARD.*>IMPORTANT
INITIALIZE SDCA-SERVICE-COMMAREA
MOVE 'VBS.CI.CREDCARD.UPD' TO SD-SRV-NAME
INITIALIZE CIC0014I-REC
MOVE CIC0015O-REC TO CIC0014I-REC
MOVE PWD1I TO CIC0014I-TRNPWD
PERFORM 1010-ASK-TIME-DATE
THRU 1010-ASK-TIME-DATE-EXIT
MOVE WS-DATEOUT TO CIC0014I-TRNPWD-LAST-DATE
MOVE CIC0014I-REC  TO SD-SRV-INPUT-DATA
EXEC CICS
LINK
PROGRAM(WS-PGM-SRV-DRIVER)
COMMAREA(WS-SRV-COMMAREA)
RESP(WS-RESP-CODE)
END-EXEC
EVALUATE WS-RESP-CODE
WHEN DFHRESP(NORMAL)
IF SD-RESP-CODE EQUAL ZEROS
MOVE 'TRANSACTION PASSWORD SET SUCCESSFULLY'
TO MSGO
MOVE 002 TO LK-OPTION
ELSE
MOVE SD-RESP-ADDITIONAL TO MSGO
END-IF
WHEN OTHER
MOVE 'SERVICE PROGRAM ERROR' TO MSGO
END-EVALUATE
SET WS-MAP-DATAONLY TO TRUE
PERFORM 3030-SEND-MAP
THRU 3030-SEND-MAP-EXIT
.

3030-SEND-MAP.
IF LK-OPTION = 001
MOVE 'PF1=RETURN PF3=EXIT ENTER=PROCESS' TO KEYO
ELSE
MOVE 'PF1=RETURN PF3=EXIT ENTER=SET PASSWORD NEED'
TO KEYO
END-IF
PERFORM 1010-ASK-TIME-DATE
THRU 1010-ASK-TIME-DATE-EXIT
EVALUATE TRUE
WHEN WS-MAP-ERASE
EXEC CICS SEND
MAP('CICS08')
MAPSET('CICS08')
FROM(CICS08O)
ERASE
END-EXEC
WHEN WS-MAP-DATAONLY

MAP('CICS08')
MAPSET('CICS08')

END-EXEC
END-EVALUATE
PERFORM 5020-RETURN-TRANS THRU 5020-RETURN-TRANS-EXIT
